surgerydetails.line2: Last Saturday of the month 10.30 am - 11.30 am at Heath Hayes Library

surgerydetails.line1: First Saturday of the month from 10.00 am - 11.00 am at Burntwood Library

councillor.keyposts: Cabinet Member for Health, Care and Wellbeing

surgerydetails.line1: I hold two surgeries, one at Bradwell Community Centre on the last Saturday of the month between 10.00 am and 12 noon. The other at Bradwell Lodge on the first Saturday of the month again between 10.00 am and 12 noon.

ward.wardtitle: Newcastle - May Bank and Cross Heath

surgerydetails.line1: My Surgery is held on the first Saturday of the month, between 10.00 am and 12 noon, at Hollinwood Meeting Hall, Hollinwood Close, Kidsgrove.

councillor.keyposts: Cabinet Support Member for Social and Health Care

surgerydetails.line1: If you have any issues or concerns which you would like to discuss then please contact me. I will be happy to meet you at a mutually convenient location and time.

ward.wardtitle: South Staffordshire - Cheslyn Hay, Essington and Great Wyrley

councillor.keyposts: Cabinet Member for Children and Community Safety

surgerydetails.line1: I am available to speak with residents at Parish Council meetings held in Perton and Pattingham. The dates of these meetings are published on the Parish Council websites.

councillor.keyposts: Cabinet Member for Economy , Environment and Transport
Shadow Cabinet Member for Children and Community Safety

surgerydetails.line1: I will be holding regular Forums. Dates to be announced soon.
Although I no longer hold a formal surgery I am available to meet my constituents at any time, either at County Buildings, my home or your home.

councillor.keyposts: Deputy Leader and Cabinet Member for Strategy, Finance and Corporate Issues

surgerydetails.line1: First Saturday of each month from 10.30 am to 12.30 pm at 50 High Street, Stone.

ward.wardtitle: Staffordshire Moorlands - Biddulph South and Endon

surgerydetails.line1: From November my Surgery will take place on the 1st Tuesday of each month at 7.30 pm at Werrington Primary School, Washerwall Lane, Werrington.
